item.title: Climate Science Day on Capitol Hill
item.description: A few weeks ago I participated in the fourth annual Climate Science Day organized by the ASA and a host of other professional and scientific societies. There’s a nice write up of the event written by Steve Pierson over at Amstat News. There were a number of statisticians there besides me, but the vast majority of people were climate modelers, atmospheric scientists, agronomists, and the like.
